column5: Looking to purchase my first flasher. Was going to make my hds portable but decided to scrap that idea. Has anyone here had any experience with this model? Ideally the lx6 would be a better fit. But it's not upgradable. Reedsports in the states has an awesome price on the unit. Just have to figure out how I'm going to get it.  Thanks

The lx-6 will be upgradable next year to my understanding.  Only difference between the two is size.  The analog flashers [lx-5] have much better battery life and are obviously cheaper, but aside from that the digital is probably the superior unit.
